artist: Artist: Seth Tobocman , et al.; Publisher: Carlo Quispe , New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, text and photomechanical illustration of punk figures superimposed on a photograph of the OWS demonstrations printed in color and black-and-white offset lithography on wove paper covers; 16 pp.
medium: Letterpress, color and black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
title: OWS Illustrated, no. 1
